pageProduct.name: Avene DermAbsolu Night Balm 40ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avene DermAbsolu Comforting Night Balm helps the skin to visibly combat the signs of ageing thanks to the unique combination of active ingredients:
- Vanilla Polyphenols: Hyaluronic Acid protectors, visibly give back substance and firm the skin, antioxidant
- SytenolTM: helps protect against collagen depletion, visibly lifts, tones and reshapes the contours of the face
- Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes the skin
This combination guarantees unprecedented benefits; visibly lifting, firming and restoring comfort to the skin.

The nourishing, velvety balm texture, leaves the skin feeling rejuvenated and intensely nourished.
By morning, features appear rested and relaxed, and overall complexion is refreshed. Skin is brighter, soothed and comfortable.

PROVEN EFFICACY to improve skin firmness by 95% after 4 weeks, and 96% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY to visibly combat the signs of ageing by 91% after 4 weeks, and 93% after 8 weeks*

PROVEN EFFICACY skin is toned by 96% after 4 weeks, and by 94% after 8 weeks*
*% of satisfaction – Consumer in use test after 1 and 2 months, applied once daily on 81 subjects
**Measurement of the Hydration Index on 20 subjects with dehydrated skin, after 1 application on the forearm

Warnings

Helps the skin to visibly combat the signs of ageing

Ingredients

  • Avene Thermal Spring Water: Soothing and anti-irritating
  • Vanilla Polyphenols: Hyaluronic Acid protectors, visibly give back substance and firm the skin, antioxidant
  • SytenolTM: helps protect against collagen depletion, visibly lifts, tones and reshapes the contours of the face 
  • Glycoleol: Essential skin lipid precursor, intensely nourishes the skin

 

Directions

Innovative and secure packaging: the airless jar. The new packaging offers absolute simplicity of use: simply turn the jar one-quarter of a turn into the "on" position and press to deliver the dose.
Apply in the evening to the face, neck and decollete.
